title: Pre -War Charm...Sun drenched....Hardwood Throughout
posting_body: ['DESCRIPTION OF APARTMENT:', 'Apartment is the entire lower floor of a two-story pre-war style dwelling and consists of the following rooms:', 'LIVING ROOM:with original hardwood floors with two windows facing the street', 'BEDROOM: with original hardwood floors and two windows facing quiet back yard area', 'KITCHEN:eat-in kitchen with all appliances (stove/refrigerator/sink and plenty of beautiful redwood cabinets)windowed with door', 'BATHROOM:is vintage tiled with full bath and windowed', 'Door from kitchen leads to shared Backyard area', 'AREA:', 'Apartment is located in Randall Manor is a safe affluent neighborhood full of tree lined blocks and beautiful pre-war homes located on the North Shore of Staten Island', "We are a is a 5 minute walk to RUMC( the Old St Vincent's Hospital)making it ideal for nurse or doctor  working at the hospital", 'S46 bus to the ferry stops on our corner', 'No need to drive to go shopping ..since the Forest Ave shopping area is only', 'one block away (Key Food ,Laundromat, Cafes ,Bars, Bakeries etc.)', 'FINANCIALS:', 'Tenant pays for cooking gas and electricity', 'Management pays for heat and hot-water', 'TO SCHEDULE PRIVATE VIEWING', 'Kindly reply with full name of all occupants', 'Cell or home number for day contact', 'Rental and employment history', 'When you would like to move- in', 'Cat OK -Sorry Not dog friendly', 'NO FEES WHATSOEVER', 'Ideal requirements for tenancy are a credit score of at least 700 and annual verifiable salary of at least 56,000', 'Castleton Ave@ Hart Blvd']
